    excerpt: "Smooch-A-Llama Rama at Moose River Farm in Old Forge took place on Saturday. The money raised from the Valentine's Day-themed event was donated to Home Aide Service of the Central Adirondacks. Kids and adults alike were able to get a close-up look at not only llamas, but also with donkeys, horses, a couple of goats and some geese."
